Posts.Content: cindanbob wrote: I'm waiting for the dr. to call with the results of the bone scan I had last week. The scan was done because I have new and persistent pain in my back and knees. Hopefully, it's only arthritis. But the waiting sure is getting on my nerves! Wish me luck and I'll let you all know as soon as I get the results. You ladies on this board sure have saved my sanity!
